alarm_create.description:
Creates an alarm in the Clock app with specified time, days, and vibration settings.
    
    Args:
        hour (int): Hour for the alarm (1-12 format)
        minute (int): Minute for the alarm (0-59)
        period (str): AM or PM indicator ("AM" or "PM")
        days (list): List of days to repeat the alarm. Options: ["Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", 
                    "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday", "Sunday"]. Default is None (no repeating days).
        enable_vibration (bool): Whether to enable vibration for the alarm. Default is True.
        app_package (str): Package name of the clock application. Default is Google Desk Clock.
    
    Returns:
        list: A list of action dictionaries representing the steps to create the alarm.
workflow_tasks: set an alarm at 12:30 pm every Friday and Sunday, disable the vibration

bluetooth_disable.description:
Abstract function to disable Bluetooth on mobile devices.
    
    This function handles the workflow of turning off Bluetooth by swiping down to access
    quick settings and then tapping the Bluetooth tile. The function is designed to be
    flexible by allowing customization of the elements and swipe parameters.
    
    Parameters:
    - swipe_element (str): The element to swipe on to open quick settings (default: workspace element)
    - bluetooth_tile_element (str): The element ID of the Bluetooth tile in quick settings (default: Bluetooth tile when on)
    - swipe_direction (str): Direction to swipe (default: "down")
    - swipe_distance (int): Distance to swipe in pixels (default: 500)
    
    Returns:
    - List of action dictionaries to execute the Bluetooth disable workflow
